examples.example: 上周我去参加了一场非常有意义的志愿者活动，收获满满。

translate.english: Last week I went to participate in a very meaningful volunteer activity and gained a lot.

examples.example: 上周我去拜访了一位许久未见的老友，我们相谈甚欢。

translate.english: Last week I went to visit an old friend whom I hadn't seen for a long time, and we had a very pleasant chat.

examples.example: 上周我和家人一起去郊外游玩，度过了非常愉快的一天。

translate.english: Last week I went to the suburbs to play with my family and had a very pleasant day.
